title: Randy Couture trains for UFC 102 where he will face Antonio
description: Everlast Endorser and UFC legend Randy "The Natural" Couture trains with (and instructs) fellow pros at his gym Xtreme Couture.  Randy will face Antonio Nogueira in the main event at UFC 102 on August 28th in Portland, OR.  Randy Couture has been the driv

asset.author: Everlast
asset.hookText: Everlast Endorser and UFC legend Randy "The Natural" Couture trains with (and instructs) fellow pros at his gym Xtreme Couture.  Randy will face Antonio Nogueira in the main event at UFC 102 on August 28th in Portland, OR.  Randy Couture has been the driving force behind the development on Everlast's new MMA equipment line.  Everlast is the official equipment supplier of Xtreme Couture.
